properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 11 THRU 21 DEC BY M/V HARRIER EXPLORER
   TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLE IN AREA BOUND BY
   03-41N 048-57W, 05-37N 047-07W,
   00-08N 041-03W, 01-58S 042-50W,
   01-55S 042-57W, 01-32S 043-14W,
   01-12S 043-35W, 00-53S 043-48W,
   00-10N 044-38W, 00-45N 045-54W,
   01-37N 046-55W, 02-29N 047-58W,
   03-36N 048-46W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 22 DEC 12.
